replies.body:
_"With Illaoi getting more spotlight, we noticed her opponents having a toughed-than-normal time dodging some of her stray tentacle arms."_

**_"Misleading Indicators"_**

So you only just noticed it right now? Just while she has spotlight attention?
So... Not paying any attention to 8 months of complaints we have been giving you since her release on this very issue?

I mean.. Why don't you just listen to us?
Personally i dont thinks its necessary for riot to fix it. Shes annoying to play against but not necessarily op.
tfw someone tries to refute valid criticism just to get on Riots good side. 'not necessary to fix broken indicators' HMMM if it means taking damage or not, IT IS necessary.

After playing support all day aiming for s- at least, it still feels the same that i have to take kills to even get a chance of s with only getting as high as A- after getting good scores and playing like a proper support. it super frustrating to play really well and put your all into a game and getting a poor score all i want to do is get some supports ranked up and i cant without pissing off my team
Finally fixed those bugs with Yasuo, thank you rito thank you.

Finally, supports can get S/S+ grades without having to go 5/0/5+.{{champion:201}} & {{champion:40}} thank you.
When does this patch go live for Oceania?

you forgot to fix the bug where if people honor you it tells you, atm it doesnt show very much once you get out of the after game screen, I know this cause 'a player that honored you wants to play with you' happens, but I didnt know. it only shows when I check the counts of honors that it went up
I hope this won't make Sona weaker as a support, she's my main :-/
OMG Pool Party {{champion:114}} looks mint as, but not that good in-game.
I Wish Riot will give us a Free Gift when its our birthday!!! Please Riot!

But here's the big kicker, all those yasuo bug fixes are just a prank because they're still in the game and are happening more frequently than they used to. Thank you riot I only waited 1 Year+ only for them to be "fixed".

Nexus Siege? Not a fan.
Teams just pick waveclear and you just wait for towers to be slowly whittled down. Not exactly fun to clear a wave then stand by your ballistas.

And, more importantly... THEY REMOVED URF FOR THIS. I wait 4 weeks for URF to come around. My monthly pilgrimage to enjoy what is arguably the best mode in the game... and its not there. GONE. At least riot tells us we dont have to check in next weekend ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
why did you buff fiora AND release a fiora skin :( i get the feeling everyone is going to be playing her but i could be wrong
I am definitely going to be playing her, but not because of the buff, just because of the skin...
Finally More skins for me to spend my money on :)
Can we please get a patch that removes all assassins and call it patch 6.87 the DotA patch of perfection?
so they nerfed leona
kys leafy
RIOT CAN YOU MAKE A PROJECT TWISTED FATE SKIN PLS THANK YOU
Riot pls fix this yasuo's bug: straight after his ult finish and you use q, the q go on cooldown and deal no damage even if you hit the enemy with it
Also Taliyah's new W cast mechanic is so frustrating, the old one was much better..

I so strongly disagree with this. So do {{champion:112}} and {{champion:68}} 
It makes so much more sense for it to be like that
